16.00.text: and a whole new beautiful world opens up to us.

32.88.text: a region where, since time immemorial,

35.04.text: people have lived in harmony with their surroundings.

41.32.text: that are thousands of years old,

43.24.text: and plants and herbs that are a gift from Mother Nature.

54.88.text: This is the birthplace of Gamila,

58.00.text: a woman who experienced the exceptional power of nature

65.00.text: A power that makes people healthier,

74.00.text: What she discovered is beauty in it's purest form.

80.76.text: Made of the most potent herbs

84.08.text: each with it's own preparation method.

87.12.text: Derived from nature that has been honoured and cherished for centuries.

99.40.text: And combined into a unique formula:
